events.onkeyup: jsx3.out('a server call could be made here to perform a lookup on the value, ' + this.childNodes[0].value + '.');
events.jsxselect: getTemplate(this.getValue());if(form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").getChecked() == 0) { if (form1.getJSXByName("HaeKayttajia_Checkbox1").getChecked()) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Kayttajat").setDisplay("block").repaint(); } else if (form1.getJSXByName("HaeRyhmia_Checkbox2").getChecked()) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Ryhmat").setDisplay("block").repaint(); } else if (form1.getJSXByName("HaeRooleja_Checkbox3").getChecked()) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Roolit").setDisplay("block").repaint(); } form1.getJSXByName("showOrHideSearch").setText("Piilota Haku", true); form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").setChecked(1); } else if(form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").getChecked() == 1) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Ryhmat").setDisplay("none").repaint(); form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Kayttajat").setDisplay("none").repaint(); form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Roolit").setDisplay("none").repaint(); form1.getJSXByName("showOrHideSearch").setText("Lisää vastaanottajia", true); form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").setChecked(0); }

events.jsxexecute: if(form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").getChecked() == 0) { if (form1.getJSXByName("HaeKayttajia_Checkbox1").getChecked()) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Kayttajat").setDisplay("block").repaint(); } else if (form1.getJSXByName("HaeRyhmia_Checkbox2").getChecked()) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Ryhmat").setDisplay("block").repaint(); } else if (form1.getJSXByName("HaeRooleja_Checkbox3").getChecked()) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Roolit").setDisplay("block").repaint(); } form1.getJSXByName("showOrHideSearch").setText("Piilota Haku", true); form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").setChecked(1); } else if(form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").getChecked() == 1) { form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Ryhmat").setDisplay("none").repaint(); form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Kayttajat").setDisplay("none").repaint(); form1.getJSXByName("Haku_Roolit").setDisplay("none").repaint(); form1.getJSXByName("showOrHideSearch").setText("Lisää vastaanottajia", true); form1.getJSXByName("searchVisible").setChecked(0); }
